text: Bounce Patrol

If you want to learn to dance like a robot
Just do what we do, you can do it too

Keep your body stiff like an astronaut
Come on take a shot, show us what you got
It’s the latest dance craze, it’s so easy to do
Come on and do it
Do the funky robot

Dance like a robot (Jump, jump) 
Dance like a robot (March, march)

Tilt your head side to side, to the left and to the right
Turn around and around to the funky robot sound
Do the Funky Robot (do the funky robot)
Move like a robot
Yeah!
Dance like a robot
Move like a robot
Dance like a robot
Now everybody let’s talk like a robot
Say what we say and talk like a robot

Beep boop bing…ding ding! 
Beep boop bing…ding ding! (Now you do it!)

Beep boop bing…ding ding!  (Talk like a robot!)
Beep boop bing…ding ding!
Beep boop bing…ding ding!
It’s the latest dance craze, it’s so easy to do

Come on and do it
Do the funky robot

Dance like a robot (Jump, jump) 
Dance like a robot (March, march)

Tilt your head side to side, to the left and to the right
Turn around and around to the funky robot sound
Do the Funky Robot (Do the funky robot)
Do the Funky Robot (Do the funky robot..bot..bot)
Now let’s do some robot moves! Do what we do. Ready?

Wave your hands like a robot 
Wave your hands, wave your hands

Stomp your feet like a robot 
Stomp your feet, stomp your feet

Bend your elbows like a robot
Bend your elbows, bend your elbows

Now clap your hands like a robot
Clap your hands, clap your hands

It’s the latest dance craze, it’s so easy to do
Come on and do it
Do the funky robot

Dance like a robot (Jump, jump) 
Dance like a robot (March, march)

Tilt your head side to side, to the left and to the right
Turn around and around to the funky robot sound

Run like a robot (Run, run)
Run like a robot (Run, run)

Run around, run around, Swing your hands up and down
Run around, run around, to the funky robot sound
And that’s the funky robot!
